Whose dear forms you often miss？

When you close your earthly story

Will you join them in their bliss?

Will the circle be unbroken

By and by, by and by?

In the sky, in the sky?

BioShock Infinite, görsellik anlayışı ve işitsel duyulara hitabı itibariyle oldukça büyük bir bütünlük sağlarken, organik olarak oynanışı ile bunu destekliyor. Açık hava konsepti, Columbia’nın çevresinde ulaşım için kullanılan magnetik raylara takip yol alabileceğiniz kancanızla birlikte oynanışın aktif bir parçası olurken, bunu savaş sistemine de entegre ediyor. Hikayesiyle çağının ötesinde olan bu oyunu tavsiye ediyorum.
画面好，画风梦幻，手感不多，剧情牛逼，总之吹爆
Nice FPS game with best story ever

never understood fps games where you spend more time searching objects than shooting, most would say its a game with a story but i  found the story  uninteresting. 

If you are like me and didn’t like the first 2 games don’t think this 1 is any better its just a pretty  turd that rewards you for not following the directional arrow by letting you search a few more objects for stuff you don’t even care you have picked up before you go back to following the arrow waiting for the next 5 crap bots to spawn

the enemies suck the guns suck its an fps game for people who prefer searching bins to shooting, honestly you search more box’s etc than you kill bots

I will say though its a very fast loading stable game shame its so dull, Its more a game for people who want to enjoy the story/experience than test their skill 

I don’t care about the money id like to refund the hours I’ve wasted in the hope it would get better

เกมส์ดีนะ
정신없고 살아남는데 급급하다가 놓친 모든것들이 엔딩에서 무엇인지 설명해주면서 뒤통수와 소름을 날리는 게임. 단언컨데 완벽합니다.

An old gem of the 2010s Bioshock Infinite is still a wonderful and unique experience, a bold risk in storytelling with beloved characters and an unforgettable setting... or the inevitable watering down and clumsy conclusion of the Bioshock series with a confusing, illogical mess of a "My First Intermediate Sci Fi" novel depending on how you feel by the end. It's a contentious game in many ways and it comes up in the game design and the story at heart but ultimately it is an enjoyable game despite the flaws and one worth experiencing for yourself, whether brand new to the series or a fan of the first two. Despite references to the older titles Infinite can function as a standalone adventure.

BS:I starts with weathered old salt Booker DeWitt, private detective and public lout. He gets a mysterious job with mysterious benefactors to go to a mysterious city and rescue a beautiful and mysterious girl, Mai Waifu. I think Infinite makes one of the best first impressions in all of gaming short of Metal Gear Rising(and excluding WAIT A MINUTE THAT CARD) and that period where you absolute soak in the setting and the story buildup is one of a kind, A++ would bottle like Elizabeth's bath water. The classics of the Bioshock formula are at play with building tension, dystopia as commentary, fun enough combat open to more fun via experimentation and abuse with your power ups and heavy hitting twists in story telling. A little too heavy but we'll get to that in a bit.

Gameplay wise Infinite seems like it could almost overthrow Bioshock 1/2. The added verticality to level designs, the skylines, the enemy variety and encounter design, the weapon/vigor upgrades and expanded arsenal and refined plasmids, it all seems to be that feel good sequel upgrade to the game. But sadly it falls short over time. A product of 2013 BS:I features regenerating health and maps designed for crouching behind cover and hoping you'll please be allowed to win the fight after you make a few mistakes. Or not, the emphasis on wide open maps in the sky with hitscan enemies can make combat unrelenting in a bad way. Being limited to 2 Guns is a direct downgrade from earlier games and combining limited weapons so that you're always swapping guns with permanent, hard-earned money upgrades to specific guns really hurts when you're out of ammo for the two you like. The second half of the game hastily doubles the size of the arsenal with Vox variants that require their own specific upgrades but by this point you just won't bother. Some of the enemies are greatly designed but clash with things like player mobility. Handymen in particular(who almost feel like they belong in a different game) are more than twice as mobile as Booker unless he's abusing skyline hopping and practically demand to be chain-stunned by vigors. It's not bad overall and Infinite has average gunplay when the enemies aren't ignoring pain-states, though...

**SPOILERS** I find it odd Irrational Games moved away from big setpiece boss fights and didn't think much of Atlas in BS1 yet Big Daddies and Handymen show they can do them just fine. Watching Slate get tuckered out and give you a story moment instead of a fight is a letdown. They make sure to put in a real dull clunker like the Ghost Siren in Infinite, force you to fight her 3 times, and cockblock the player from story closure and satisfaction with no Songbird fight. The final battle of the game mostly involves hiding behind cover and waiting to press your I Win button enough times.

**END SPOILERS** Exploration is pretty good as just being in Columbia is a joy, graphically and immersively. Infinite has a great deal of engaging setup as far as the story goes and well into the halfway point of the game I was hooked. Elizabeth is a pretty fun footnote in the history of narrative companions, generally useful, opening up the fun use of rifts in combat(though a few are just I Win buttons) and an illusion of helpful agency by feeding you powerups though that can feel convoluted at times, like coin flags triggered after literally every vendor use. I must give kudos for avoiding the possibility of a bad escort mission since Elizabeth is invincible in combat. Halfway into the game I meet an interesting new group and if you've read this far and want to stay unspoiled then I'd say yes, Bioshock Infinite is a good game. It's probably still worth the $30, honestly, but easy to get on sale and a deal at $20 or less.

**SPOILERS** Every replay of Infinite follows the same constants where the first half is a joy and then it starts to break down and grind. The game starts to weaken for me when you meet the Vox Populi and are sent for the gunsmith, which is a shame since the atmosphere in Finktown is great. Infinite has one of the best first halves in the medium. The parallel universe story elements are interesting but the uses are odd. Throughout the second half I felt like Booker and Elizabeth were genuinely idiots or I was doing something pointless. Luckily whenever something dumb happened I'd literally pull plot out of thin air and change universes. This also broke my immersion. I had a pretty firm mental picture of the stakes of Columbia Prime and shaking it up rapidly multiple times eroded that. Combat can start to drag near the end, enemies start teleporting in behind or on top of you in packs, level design narrows, story focus gets a touch absurd and you can almost feel the point where the game had to be finished to ship. Some elements of writing are very on the nose(morality of killing, racism, etc) but the setting and narrative overall hold together, at least until the ending and your personal conclusions on that. I didn't like it much at first but have come to understand and appreciate it more since and maintain that Infinite is good overall, if flawed. There are plot holes and the climax isn't the best but I respect it and the experiences of others. **END SPOILERS**

At its worst Infinite would still be an above average game and so much of it is a subjective experience that I think it best for those interested and fans of the series to just play it themselves and forge their own conclusions. There's a lot of DLC though personally I think Clash is tedious filler unless you're utterly addicted to the combat and Burial at Sea did things to the story I did not enjoy(with decent gameplay, at least.) Getting Infinite for $10-30 is reasonable, I'd wait for a sale on the pass and try for $10 for the full set. I could go back and forth for hours about what Infinite did right and wrong but I find it telling that I'm invested enough to study and think about it long after that first playthrough, even if I'm chewing on a plot hole.

Хорошего много не бывает((( - 8/10 Игра интересная , запутанная , в конце даже как то грустно было( К сюжету Bioshock многим современным играм нужно сейчас ровняться , так как эта история супер ... Гемплейный сегмент игры довольно таки скудный , нету открытого мира , нету стелса - просто линейный шутер . Саундтрек в этой игре превосходный , вся музыка в игре погружает тебя в атмосферу небесного города , сравнить могу только с Ведьмаком. Стрельба в игре хорошо проработанная , ты ощущаешь мощь оружия , его вес и т.д . Персонажи в игре загадочные ( не все) , мне не понравилось то что не раскрыли образ Комстока и его жены , а другие персы в игре топ  - кон**** Дейзи , прекрасная Элизабет , а еще мне хотелось бы узнать побольше об Девитте Букере ( главной персонаже ) ... 
Сюжет этой игры можно обсуждать можно долго , но спойлерить я не хочу.
Эту игру я 100% рекомендую .

放在2019年，唯一能夸得估计就是剧情吧，不多说，剧情给10分好吧

其他方面也看个人喜好吧，风格不太喜欢，有点梦幻的感觉，尤其是色调什么的

武器的手感很假，技能的同质化比较严重，有些几乎不怎么用，没有地图，ui极简

放在前几年，我想还是相当优秀的一部作品吧

生化奇兵真好玩！XD 不同于第一作的乌托邦水世界，本作的背景是

天空之城！^w^ 画面极度绚丽，极度震撼，极度舒适~ XD

因为听别的玩家们说了，第二作是整个三部曲时间线的终末，所以就

玩通初代后就直接来玩Infinite了~ 

感觉比起初代来，省却了略显无趣的解锁（水渠）小游戏还是挺人性化的。

并且，枪斗因为音效和着弹的特效都比原作好上许多，感觉更带劲儿了~

刚玩到学会第三个超能力的地方，感觉对超能力的应用设定也有所强化，

总之是保留下来了各种各样的优点，并且把粗糙的地方打磨得更精致了。

不愧是生化奇兵三部曲的完美收官之作~ TwT 

希望以后还能玩到更多这样的“艺术品”~
称之为艺术品毫不为过，这就是生化奇兵系列吸睛之处

在不失FPS游戏突突突的快感与刺激时，该作的剧情也让人回味。
如果你不擅长射击游戏，那就选个简单模式去看看剧情吧，就当读一个光怪陆离而令人感慨的故事。

4.2 saat aralıksız oynadım, öncelikle oyun normal başlıyor, hiç bilmiyorsanız öğreniyorsunuz yavaş yavaş. Zaten oyun içinde basmanız gereken tuşa kadar size gösteriyor. Belli bir yere geldikten sonra artık kafanız karışmaya başlıyor keşke o topu atsaydım diyorsunuz bazen, bazende keşke bekleseydim diyebiliyorsunuz. Yani oyunda kritik yerlerde size 2 seçenek sunuyor . Benim şansıma her seferinde aksiyona girdim :D  Bazen kafam o kadar çok karıştıki. Oyunu durdurup bir yüzümü yıkadım . Sürükleyici mi evet, oynanıştan çok fazla bir şey beklemeyin ama çok kötü de değil.  Oynanışa 3, hikayeye 5, grafiklere 5  verdim gitti :)
BioShock Infinite is a masterpiece，which lead you into a fancy world，a attractive story.
Oynamayan varsa herşeyi bıraksın oynasın. Kesinlikle muazzam ötesi bi oyun. beni derinden ve hiç sıkılmadan etkileyen ilk 10 oyun arasında kesinlikle...
刚通完关，作为我第一个通关的单机游戏，我感觉自己是十分的幸运吧，碰到这么一款好游戏，虽然之前有点不太适应这个游戏操作，但玩久之后就没感觉了，最开始其实我挺讨厌这游戏画质的感觉不是很好，但玩着玩着感觉诶挺好的，配合着好听到爆的音乐真的是一种享受，十分推荐吧，还有你们一定要看人员名单，里面有那个男主谈吉他伊丽莎白调舞的那首歌

Win10的玩家們 遊戲進去就閃退的解決方法如下 :

首先開啟Window Defender

進入之後點 病毒與威脅防護 > 病毒與威脅防護設定 > 受控資料夾存取權

將裡面的設定關閉即可 就可以正常進入遊戲遊玩

Jugué BioShock Infinite sin haber jugado ningún BioShock anterior, sólo el 1, pero nada más le dediqué muy pocas horas y no pude llegar ni a la mitad de la historia.

Me encantó el apartado gráfico, es simplemente hermoso. Jugué con todas las opciones en ULTRA y en ningún momento bajó de los 150 FPS, lo cual está bastante bien.
Los diseños de los personajes están muy bien logrados, tan bien logrados que me quedé quieto por minutos viento tan sólo la calidad de los personajes.

La jugabilidad es notable, lo único que tengo para criticar (a la saga BioShock en general) es el tema del apuntado con las armas, la mira metálica del arma rara vez me ha ayudado, sólo la mira del rifle de precisión me fue de bastante ayuda en varias situaciones. Me hubiese gustado que en esta entrega se hubiesen podido agregar miras para cada arma, ya sea comprándolas en el Dolar Bill o mejorando el arma.

Antes de comprar BioShock Infinite leí algo mínimo sobre su historia, para saber si era un juego que me podía interesar, y cuando leí que había que rescatar una chica fue inevitable pensar en el gran Resident Evil 4, donde más de uno se agarró una bronca tremenda con Ashley cuando los enemigos la agarraban y se la llevaban.
Pero cuando me dispuse a jugar el título me di cuenta que la compañía de Elizabeth (la chica que debemos rescatar) no era en nada parecida a la de Ashley.
Elizabeth es una chica que se puede cuidar por sí misma, en ningún momento del juego tenemos que tener cuidado con ella porque corre peligro de que en medio de un combate los enemigos la capturen.
Esta chica nos es de bastante utilidad, de hecho, cuando nos encontramos en medio de un combate, ella se encarga de buscar botiquines, o sales, para poder restaurar nuestra salud o nuestros poderes. También tiene roles clave en la historia, como abrir "desgarros" y también forzar cerraduras con ganzúas.

La historia es una completa locura, esta reseña la estoy escribiendo justo después de terminar el juego, porque quiero tener todo fresco para contar todo a la perfección y no olvidarme de absolutamente nada.
Como dije, la historia es espectacular, el final es uno de los mejores que he visto en mucho tiempo. Es tan sorprendente y tan bueno como confuso, al principio me costó entender el final, pero luego de meditar un poco sobre todo lo sucedido en el juego y sobre las escenas finales pude entenderlo todo. No es un final para cualquiera, hay que estar muy atento a todos los momentos finales del juego para entenderlo bien.
En resumen, la historia es excelente, y de las mejores que pude ver en la historia de los videojuegos (no lo digo en broma).

Para terminar, el juego me lo pasé entero en "Difícil". Esta dificultad me decepcionó bastante la verdad, yo me esperaba enemigos mucho más fuertes, que supusieran un gran reto para mí y que tuviese que esforzarme al máximo para poder vencerlos... pero no fue así.
En cuanto conseguí la Carabina, comencé a mejorar su daño, y cuando llegué al nivel máximo de daño, mataba de tres o cuatro tiros a la cabeza a casi cualquier enemigo (menos los patriotas y todo enemigo "grande" por así decir).
Sinceramente me esperaba un poco más de esta dificultad, pero pude disfrutar plenamente del juego a pesar de esta "pega" si así se le puede llamar.

Recomendado 9/10 para todo el que quiera una gran historia y aventura.

While the story was short (probably because I didn't play on the hardest difficulty, my fault) it sure was enjoyable every single moment I played. What makes this unique is not just the visuals and the excellent story telling, but Elizabeth's AI, which turns fight scenes even more action. It's just almost flawless (reminds me of the effort put into Alien: Isolation's AI). 

I definitely recommend you buy this!

游戏总是玩一段时间卡死！
在我的游戏环境下已经找到了解决办法，进入游戏需要把输入法修改成英文，并且将输入法修改成只能通过win+空格切换成中文。只要进游戏后没有中文输入法跳出，就一直没有出现卡死。

No tengo palabras para expresar lo mucho que me gustó este juego y toda la saga, si me pidieran recomendar una saga de juegos, sin dudar ni un segundo recomiendo BioShock. Te atrapa la trama, te atrapa el diseño del mapa y del entorno, te atrapa la modalidad de juego, el diseño de personajes, las armas y habilidades que el personaje principal posee, asi como la conexión y motivación entre los villanos, etc. Me atrevo a decir que este juego es una verdadera obra de arte, el como se llevo a cabo una historia tan atrapante, y al mismo tiempo hicieron que la historia de esta entrega (infinite) se una al primer juego. En lo personal, no se puede no jugar mas de una vez,  la trama temporal es como ver back to the future, todo esta conectado.

Si tuviera que darle nota, le daria un 10 de 10, y eso seria poco.

Ich hab mich wirklich geärgert das spiel unter der woche angefangen zu haben. am ersten tag 5 stunden gespielt bis spät am abend, am nächsten tag unausgeschlafen zur arbeit und anschließend fertig gespielt. die erste etwa halbe stunde vom spiel beginnt etwas langweilig, ab dann fällt mir im moment kein anderes spiel ein das mich so mitgerissen hat. ich habs im bundle mit allen anderen teilen zusammen gekauft und wenn die nur halb so gut sind wie der hier dann...naja ich hab jetzt urlaub genommen. ich geb dem spiel auf jedenfall 10/10 punkten.

vorsicht spoiler
da ich das spiel quasi am stück durchgespielt hab ist mir viel aufgefallen, vieles geht um variablen und konstante.wir werden gefragt ob wir rudern wollen und die frau im boot sagt das wir das verneinen in allen welten werfen wir kopf beim münzwurf, konstante. das medaillon bei dem man vogel oder käfig wählen kann ist eine variable. chen lins frau ist auch nur da wenn er entführt wird. variable. wir sterben am ende indem wir von elizabeth ertränkt werden egal ob wir für oder gegen die taufe sind sterben wir. das macht eine neue naja variable ohne variable auf unseren charakter bezogen weil wir nicht leben somit keine tochter haben da es schwierig ist frauen zu schwängern wenn man selbst nicht geboren wird, man kann comstock keine tochter mehr verkaufen. elizabeth tötet in dem fall nicht nur uns sondern sorgt dafür das es sie selbst nicht gibt. aber macht das sinn? sie war in dieser variable doch frei und es war alles wieder gut. wollte sie den "krieg" verhindern? wird elizabeth trotzdem geboren, muss aber nicht gegen das tilgen der schulden getauscht werden und kann ein normales leben führen...allerdings verschwindet elizabeth am ende doch, existiert sie dann doch nicht oder nur als anna?  es besteht auch die variable das ich ein paar räume übersehen habe und ein paar fragen beantwortet werden können.

Pour moi, le pire de la série. Ils ont enlevé tous ce qui faisait de bioshock une oeuvre originale et cohérente, pour le remplacer par des mécaniques de jeux surfaite et populaire afin de touché un publique de niche. xp
Im speechless..

Mesmo sendo o terceiro jogo da série, pode se afirmar que é algo totalmente diferente dos anteriores. E eu espero que seja feito uma continuação!
  A primeira diferença é que o mundo em que se passa o jogo é paralelo aos anteriores, assim não tem nada a ver com eles. Jogabilidade boa, cenários bonitos e bem construídos.
 O enredo é ótimo, bem estruturado e envolvente (menos que o segundo game). O final surpreende bastante, chega a ser mais fácil de finalizar do que o primeiro jogo.
Me renderam 15 horas de entretenimento, mesmo assim não platinei!
初代から通して、FPSとしてじゃなく雰囲気だけを楽しむゲーム。

虽然我和她年龄有点差距，我遇见她的时候，我邋里邋遢地来到了她的面前，欺骗她说会带她去看巴黎的风景，然后我们一起冒险，虽然那只钢铁大鸟每次都烦我，但是我不介意，突然又一次我一转身我发现我爱上了她。为了她，我杀了那个该死的神父，几乎忘记了我卖掉的女儿，衷心希望我和她能够到巴黎去看最美的风景。

然后世界线就不对了，神父是我？她是我女儿？

后来想了想，我不介意我们两个之间禁断的关系，只要我还爱着她就行。那个所谓是我的神父反正也死了，我们其实还是可以。。。。。。。

后来我看见了好多好多的她，就在我嘿嘿嘿止不住口水的时候，她却把我淹死在了河里

One of my favorite games of all time. Elizabeth is actually useful. 10/10

在通关了《最后生还者》和《神秘海域4》这两款偏线性的游戏后，我一度以为纯线性游戏的消亡，是有原因的，尽管前两个游戏收获了各大媒体的满分。直到我接触了《生化奇兵无限》，Irrational Games, 请接受我最真挚的钦佩和歉意，就像梵高生前饿死了一样，生化奇兵无限的销量成为了这个工作室解散的导火索。

这是为数不多我觉得触及到了第九艺术天花板的作品，因为游戏中参杂着很多晦涩而有深度的宗教、哲学、种族问题，对量子物理学，平行宇宙虫洞，时间穿越的思考，美轮美奂的天空之城（无限之城），虚幻写实相依无缝的画面，有趣的滑绳过山车系统。整个游戏的气氛急剧变化，从热闹变成萧条，从萧条变成阴森，伴着时急时缓的背景音乐，第一人称视角的加持，沉浸感特别强烈。

哥伦比亚在游戏中可以说是一段美国历史的剪影。而和生化奇兵的极乐城一样，哥伦比亚从表面上来看果真如同大家所梦想的乌托邦一样，但随着内容的深入，其不为人知的一面也逐渐地显露出来。天空之城哥伦比亚被塑造成了一座反乌托邦之城，在先知的领导下，人们看似安居乐业，但真相却是先知以白人至上主义建设的哥伦比亚，成了白人的天堂，有色人种的地狱。天空之城就如同油画一般，现在看来也依旧让人惊艳。

游戏中有很多的隐喻，比如说游戏中第一个选择正是隐喻圣经中一个小故事，在这个故事中耶稣说“若你们中有任何人没有犯过罪，那么你便可以是第一个向她投石头的人”，而主人公作为刚刚进入哥伦比亚的人，正是这个“没有犯过罪”的人。作为一个崭新的国家，美国在发展的道路上充满了愚昧、偏见、以及鲜血和尸骨。而游戏中得哥伦比亚所表现的则正是美国黑暗的一面，他们曾以此为自豪的一面。值得讽刺的是，从美国的神定命运中诞生的哥伦比亚，在美国本身的理念和想法逐渐进步之后，反而宣判美国是背叛了上帝的神祗。

艺术性的游戏是保值的，就像《旺达与巨像》孤独的艺术，《生化奇兵无限》是叙事，哲学，宗教，物理，人性，种族，乌托邦，战争的艺术，即使若干年以后再来回味，依旧是游戏殿堂里让别的游戏触不可及的天花板。 

总体评分 9.5/10

Si lo tuviera que definir en una palabra sería: Perfecto. Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, una historia magnífica, una jugabilidad innovadora en su momento, divertida y rejugable, personajes bien definidos con los que empatizas rapidamente, un villano no convencional, y de los mejores ambientes que he visto con un arte y detalles sublimes. Para mí el mejor de la saga, sin duda lo recomiendo al 100%. Vale la pena comprarlo con o sin rebajas.
最喜欢的游戏角色伊丽莎白，没有之一

Hmm. For my taste, this game went one step too far into the direction of modern game design. Everything feels very simplified and streamlined gameplay-wise. It does have its good moments definitely, work went into it, and it's neither unfinished nor buggy, but games that baby-sit you for even the simplest things you do all game just don't quite cut it for me.

It's not even that the game was too easy, but it is just too far dumbed-down for what its focus is. Yes, year-2000 games sometimes overdid it with the (e.g.) inventory micro-management, but it was an important part of the games, and removing it completely makes it lack an important aspect of what's going on.

By the end you don't beat the game , it beats you.

ВНИМАНИЕ, пытаясь понять сюжет биосхоцка инфинитю-вы рискуете потерять рассудок, семью и работу. Перепроходил и буду перепроходить ещё не раз!

Это очень хорошая игра с интересным сюжетом, но так себе стрельбой, уже, можно сказать, классика. Играйте с русской озвучкой, потому что диалогов много и читать не очень удобно, да и русская озвучка сделана очень качественно (переведены даже текстуры, актеров озвучки много, для каждого персонажа свой). В общем игра обязательна к прохождению, но играйте лучше сразу на высоком уровне сложности (я не хардкор геймер, некоторые игры вообще прохожу на легком уровне сложности и не парюсь), т.к. на нормале ну уж совсем неинтересно играть именно в шутерную часть.

내가 여태 해본 스토리게임중 두번째로 감명받은 게임이다 개인차에 따라 스토리해석도 다르고 이해도 달라 스토리가 어려울순있지만 진짜 몰입감 쩐다 내가 유튭에서 스토리영상들을 보고도 이게임을 삿는데 직접엔딩보는게 역시 더 이해가고 재밌다 

나온지 6년이되엇지만 왠만한 게임하고는 비교도 할수없다 물론 그래픽이 요즘 씹고퀄 게임들에 비해 좋진않지만 
광원효과도 잘넣고 멥보는맛도 쏠쏠하다 진짜 멥구경이 너무이쁘고 멋있다
